explanation: [0-0] Steve stands in a dark corridor, nervously gripping a black lever connected to the ground. The floor is black, as are the surrounding walls. A silver ventilation duct runs along the upper right side, and a lamp casts light in the background.

[0-9] A horrifying figure in a white robe, covered in blood, slowly walks toward Steve from the depths of the corridor. The figure stretches out its arms, approaching the trap unguarded. Steve pulls the lever, and the figure falls into the trap. Then, a giant, creepy hand emerges from the depths of the corridor, crawling along the ground and slowly approaching Steve. Steve presses the lever, and the giant hand also falls into the trap. Immediately afterward, a burning minotaur rushes out from the depths of the corridor, charging straight at Steve. Pressing the button again, the minotaur also falls into the trap. Finally, a giant black spider emerges from the darkness, rapidly crawling toward Steve. Steve quickly presses the lever, and the spider falls into the trap.
